name: CVE-2014-9709
description: The GetCode_ function in gd_gif_in.c in GD 2.1.1 and earlier, as used in PHP before 5.5.21 and 5.6.x before 5.6.5, allows remote attackers to cause a denial of service (buffer over-read and application crash) via a crafted GIF image that is improperly handled by the gdImageCreateFromGif function.
pattern: [(software:cpe='cpe:2.3:a:php:php:*:*:*:*:*:*:*:*' OR software:cpe='cpe:2.3:a:php:php:*:*:*:*:*:*:*:*' OR software:cpe='cpe:2.3:a:php:php:*:*:*:*:*:*:*:*') OR (software:cpe='cpe:2.3:o:opensuse:opensuse:13.1:*:*:*:*:*:*:*' OR software:cpe='cpe:2.3:o:opensuse:opensuse:13.2:*:*:*:*:*:*:*') OR (software:cpe='cpe:2.3:a:libgd:libgd:*:*:*:*:*:*:*:*') OR (software:cpe='cpe:2.3:o:debian:debian_linux:8.0:*:*:*:*:*:*:*' OR software:cpe='cpe:2.3:o:debian:debian_linux:7.0:*:*:*:*:*:*:*') OR (software:cpe='cpe:2.3:o:canonical:ubuntu_linux:12.04:*:*:*:lts:*:*:*' OR software:cpe='cpe:2.3:o:canonical:ubuntu_linux:16.04:*:*:*:lts:*:*:*' OR software:cpe='cpe:2.3:o:canonical:ubuntu_linux:15.10:*:*:*:*:*:*:*' OR software:cpe='cpe:2.3:o:canonical:ubuntu_linux:14.04:*:*:*:lts:*:*:*')]
